reviewText: This video shows the remarkable spirit and resiliency of the people of Kauai after the devastating effects of hurricane Iniki.  It shows actual footage of the hurricane as it is going on, and somber scenes of the destruction that followed. In the end the film is filled with hope and love and the aloha spirit of Hawaii's people.  See it!  The seller had it to me in a couple of days, and was very proactive in terms of offering help if there was a problem--which there was not.
